markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Gaffe Glasses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2380)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 191 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These wire-rim glasses appear to be [_glasses of sociability_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1057), making you think they grant a +1 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) when they grant none. The GM secretly adjusts your Diplomacy checks to ignore the bonus, and if you have multiple +1 item bonuses to Diplomacy, the glasses take precedence, negating those bonuses.

<document level="2" id="action-1947" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gaffe Glasses

The GM secretly adjusts your Diplomacy checks to ignore the bonus, and if you have multiple +1 item bonuses to Diplomacy, the glasses take precedence, negating those bonuses.
